connect-wallets.description: Connect your EVM and BTC wallets to transfer assets seamlessly. For the best experience, use wallets from both networks.

get-started.here-are-some-options-testnet: Here are some faucets you might want to explore.

learn-more-tutorials.get-started-with-web-pop-miner: Get started with PoP mining and explore the beginner web app.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-about-capsules: Learn about gasless transactions, re-routing/recalling, and configurable security with Capsules on Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-about-multisig-wallet: Learn about multi-sig wallets and set up a Safe Wallet on Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-add-themi-wallet: Earning tHEMI rewards from PoP mining? Add the token contract address and view rewards.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-deploy-erc20: Learn how to deploy an ERC-20 token on Hemi using Hardhat.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-develop-hello-world: Learn how to develop and deploy a HelloWorld smart contract on Hemi using Remix IDE.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-get-bitcoin-balance: Deploy a small contract in Remix IDE with a single method which calls the Bitcoin Balance precompile and returns the balance.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-setup-btc-wallet: Learn how to set up and get started with a BTC (UniSat) wallet.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-setup-evm-wallet: Learn how to set up and get started with an EVM (MetaMask) wallet.
learn-more-tutorials.learn-to-tunnel-to-hemi: Learn how to tunnel (bridge) your ETH assets to and from Hemi.
learn-more-tutorials.run-web-pop-miner: Run the PoP Miner Web App
learn-more-tutorials.set-up-cli-pop-miner: Set up and run your PoP miner, either by downloading pre-built binaries or by building from source.

get-started.learn-about-tunneling: Learn about tunneling assets to and from Hemi.
get-started.learn-to-deploy-smart-contract: Beginner friendly! Learn how to deploy smart contracts.
